title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business
description:
,Microsoft Edge for Business aims to address the needs of both end users and IT Pros. It is designed to help meet the needs of the evolving security landscape while empowering users to be more productive. In addition to the rich set of native enterprise controls, it now supports a new look and feel, automatic switching to keep your work and personal browsing separate, a lightly managed Enterprise Personal Browser window (MSA profile), support for Unmanaged BYOPC, and Company Branding.Â  Microsoft Edge for Business will be the standard browser experience for organizations and will get activated by Azure Active Directory (AAD) login.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business
